User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the VoltaView Auth application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

photoURL.description: The URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

Esp32Data.title: Esp32Data
Esp32Data.description: Represents data received from an ESP32 device.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Esp32Data entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the data was received, ideally as a server timestamp.

voltage.description: The voltage reading from the sensor.

current.description: The current reading from the sensor.

temperature.description: The temperature reading from the sensor.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. The 'userId' parameter is the Firebase Auth UID.
Stores time-series sensor data from a user's ESP32 device.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore data structure is designed to ensure authorization independence, clarity, and scalability. User data is stored under `/users/{userId}`. ESP32 data is stored as a subcollection at `/users/{userId}/esp32_data/{esp32DataId}`. This structure maintains a clear ownership model where each user's sensor data is nested under their profile, allowing for intuitive and secure data access using Firestore's security rules.
